source.b72bf29a:
# MLJAR AutoML + Optuna

MLJAR is an Automated Machine Learning framework. 

It is available as Python package with code at GitHub: https://github.com/mljar/mljar-supervised

The MLJAR AutoML can work in several modes:

- Explain - ideal for initial data exploration
- Perform - perfect for production-level ML systems
- Compete - mode for ML competitions under restricted time budget
- Optuna - mode for ML competitions with Optuna used for hyperparameters tuning

In the Optuna mode, each algorithm [`Random Forest`, `Extra Trees`, `Xgboost`, `LightGBM`, `CatBosot`] is tuned with Optuna hperparameters framework with selected time budget (controlled with `optuna_time_budget`).

Let's try to predict house prices with MLJAR AutoML :)
